name: Salovia
startIntroPart1: Petro Carlisle, architect of Salovia’s great expansion, your people have flourished by claiming the farthest frontiers. From the first settlements along the coast to the distant valleys and resource-rich plains, your vision has brought growth where others saw only wilderness. Each border pushed outward is a testament to your people’s ambition and resolve.
startIntroPart2: Yet the world beyond your borders grows crowded. Will you continue to seize new lands and secure Salovia’s place among the great powers of history?
declaringWar: It may be the way of things… but destiny now places us in battle.
attacked: So, the mask falls. You show your true shame at last.
defeated: I have failed my people… but at the break of dawn, we will rise again.
introduction: Ah, well hello, my name is Petro Carlisle. We hope you are in good fortune today.
tradeRequest: My good friends, I bring you an offer most excelente.
uniques: Gain control over [resource] tiles in a [2]-tile radius <upon building a [City center] improvement>
